  \subsubsection{Methods}

    \label{pycosmicstar:structuresabstract:structuresabstract:massFunction}
    \index{pycosmicstar \textit{(package)}!pycosmicstar.structuresabstract \textit{(module)}!pycosmicstar.structuresabstract.structuresabstract \textit{(class)}!pycosmicstar.structuresabstract.structuresabstract.massFunction \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{massFunction}(\textit{self}, \textit{lm}, \textit{z})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Return the mass function of dark halos

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{pycosmicstar:structuresabstract:structuresabstract:fstm}
    \index{pycosmicstar \textit{(package)}!pycosmicstar.structuresabstract \textit{(module)}!pycosmicstar.structuresabstract.structuresabstract \textit{(class)}!pycosmicstar.structuresabstract.structuresabstract.fstm \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{fstm}(\textit{self}, \textit{lm})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Numerical function that return the value of sigm that will be used by 
    dfridr to calculate d\_sigma\_dlog10(m).

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{pycosmicstar:structuresabstract:structuresabstract:halos_n}
    \index{pycosmicstar \textit{(package)}!pycosmicstar.structuresabstract \textit{(module)}!pycosmicstar.structuresabstract.structuresabstract \textit{(class)}!pycosmicstar.structuresabstract.structuresabstract.halos\_n \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{halos\_n}(\textit{self}, \textit{z})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Return the integral of the mass function of dark halos multiplied by 
    mass in the range of log(M\_min) a log(M\_max)

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{pycosmicstar:structuresabstract:structuresabstract:fbstruc}
    \index{pycosmicstar \textit{(package)}!pycosmicstar.structuresabstract \textit{(module)}!pycosmicstar.structuresabstract.structuresabstract \textit{(class)}!pycosmicstar.structuresabstract.structuresabstract.fbstruc \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{fbstruc}(\textit{self}, \textit{z})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Return the faction of barions into structures

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{pycosmicstar:structuresabstract:structuresabstract:numerical_density_halos}
    \index{pycosmicstar \textit{(package)}!pycosmicstar.structuresabstract \textit{(module)}!pycosmicstar.structuresabstract.structuresabstract \textit{(class)}!pycosmicstar.structuresabstract.structuresabstract.numerical\_density\_halos \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{numerical\_density\_halos}(\textit{self}, \textit{z})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Return the numerial density of dark halos within the comove volume

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{pycosmicstar:structuresabstract:structuresabstract:abt}
    \index{pycosmicstar \textit{(package)}!pycosmicstar.structuresabstract \textit{(module)}!pycosmicstar.structuresabstract.structuresabstract \textit{(class)}!pycosmicstar.structuresabstract.structuresabstract.abt \textit{(method)}}

    \raggedright \textbf{abt}(\textit{self}, \textit{a})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Return the accretion rate of barionic matter into strutures

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}
